entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OwnsMany generates multiple delete statements instead of a single SQL statement (EF Core 7.0.4) #30590
  • EFCore 7 get errors when try to query a `ToJson` column #30589

Closed

  • JSON Column nullable #29838

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression #30591
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30537
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.12 to 8.1.0 #30585
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Fix to #30565 - Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30568
  • [release/7.x] Fixes around IncludeExpression for ExecuteUpdate/Delete (#30571) #30579
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
